ygData.subject: Re: SV: Tinkering skill cap, fixed?
ygData.msgSnippet: Do like I did, wait to start tinkering until you re level 50!  Muahahaha...  No skill caps here =) Anyway, I hit skill 102 tonight, tried 8 lungs, made 4.
ygData.messageBody:
Do like I did, wait to start tinkering until you're
level 50! Muahahaha... No skill caps here =)

Anyway, I hit skill 102 tonight, tried 8 lungs, made
4. Time to sell them and do it again.

Gazamel Prime - Solusek Ro
Sol's only 50th Gnome Warrior
Dealers of Death

Int 164 without buffs, yeah baby, I'm a smart warrior!

--- Zinken <zinken@...> wrote:
> No you cant, they didnt fix it in the server patch.
> I petitioned again about it but the only one i got
> an anwser from was an aprentice guide. And you all
> know how much they can help you.
>
> But he thought that when they fix it we are gonna
> see a msg about it, so keep on petition about this
> until they fix it.
>
>
> Askur of Veeshan
>
> - Original Message -----
> From: tomservo8899 <tomservo8899@...>
> To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 10:12 PM
> Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Tinkering skill cap, fixed?
>
>
> > From: "tomservo8899" <tomservo8899@...>
> >
> > I just read that the patch that was supposed to be
> this morning was actually
> > already done. They did it when the servers were
> down with that Cerfnet and
> > UUnet trouble. Anyway, I was wondering if anyone
> has tried the tinkering
> > skill since the patch to see if the skill cap (I
> think it was (Level - 15) x
> > 5) has been fixed yet. I had been hoping that
> they would fix it in this
> > patch after someone reported that a GM said they
> should be fixing it soon,
> > maybe even in the next patch. If anyone knows if
> you can Tinker outside the
> > level cap now please say so =)
> >
> > Logalog,
> > Veeshan Server
> >
> >
>
<HR>
<html>
>
